descriptions: The student demonstrates no understanding of personal stressors.
The student struggles to identify any personal stressors.
The student identifies one or two potential stressors but lacks depth in understanding.
The student identifies several personal stressors with a basic understanding of their impact.
The student accurately identifies multiple personal stressors and demonstrates a good understanding of their effects.
The student comprehensively identifies a wide range of personal stressors, demonstrating a deep understanding of their complex impact on well-being.
The student is unaware of any stress management techniques.
The student knows a few stress management techniques, but doesn't show how they are useful.
The student describes one or two stress management techniques but struggles to explain how they work.
The student identifies several stress management techniques and provides a basic explanation of their application.
The student describes a variety of stress management techniques and explains how they can be effectively used.
The student comprehensively assesses a wide range of stress management techniques, providing insightful explanations of their mechanisms and appropriate application in various scenarios.
The student does not apply any stress management techniques.
The student attempts to apply a stress management technique, but shows little to no utility.
The student attempts to apply a stress management technique, but struggles to use it correctly or effectively.
The student applies one or two stress management techniques with some success.
The student effectively applies several stress management techniques to manage personal stressors.
The student skillfully and consistently applies a variety of stress management techniques, demonstrating adaptability and resilience in managing personal stressors.
